content:
You can paste your new AURA direction right here. Give me:

1. **Title** — what do you want to call this new project?
2. **Text/description** — paste the full concept, research, or PRD

I'll create the project and optionally run it through the AI Council if you want early validation. Or we can just get it into the portfolio first and evaluate later.

What's the title, and what do you want to paste?
